3: Clear!
All clear over here!
The CPF casing is open! Come take a look!
Status... green. This CPF is in remarkably good condition.
It should reactivate in no time.
The CPF we have in Asslam breaks a lot...
...At least since Chief Andre's been gone.
No matter. With the help of Babylonia, Asslam has received enough parts now.
No need to worry.
Oooh—!
Oh my—! Get over here, guys!
Kamui, yooo, get a load of this!
Ohmygod ohmygod ohmygod! Is this the—
—The Mogpal Combat Bible! The limited edition director's cut, too!
Ooh! And there's a... Knight Weapon Complex BRM-16 model gun! And metal!!

2: Put the toy gun down, Kamui...

3: Guess it's better to let these two enjoy their new toys.
Commandant, over here.
The tip of Lucia's blade points at a dead body spread-eagle on the ground, already stiff.
Probably dead for a while. Must have starved to death.
This must be the 'King'. How did he end up like this?
I heard that humans could develop hallucinations when extremely hungry. They could see things that don't exist.
...I'll contact Babylonia and tell them that it's all clear here.
